content: these one inch teacups are totally addictive and so much fun to mix and match color combos they are knit entirely in the round from the top down in one piece the handle is made by stretching out a bobble hooray for not having to sew on something so tiny to finish simply weave in any loose ends and give them some steam want to make an adorable beer mug click here 1 big thanks to bonewoman 2 > **praise for seamless teacup** > > super quick and easy isgarner 3 > > this tea cup is so fast and so cute > edieglass 4 > > so quick and easy elemenopeo 5 > > quick knit it s so little and > cute and fun minnistitcher 6 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/bonewoman/seamless-teacup 2 https //www ravelry com/people/bonewoman 3 https //www ravelry com/projects/lsgarner/seamless-teacup 4 https //www ravelry com/projects/edieglass/amigurumi-tea-cup 5 https //www ravelry com/projects/elemenopeo/teacup-test 6 https //www ravelry com/projects/minnistitcher/wee-tea-cup
